parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma1

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control - HTML

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the <tt>sizeEx</tt> property for most controls as follows: 
* <tt>CT_MAP</tt> - "sizeExNames"
* <tt>CT_STRUCTURED_TEXT</tt> - "size" (since Arma 3 v2.01)
* <tt>CT_HTML</tt> - "P" >> "sizeEx"
* Other - "sizeEx"
For getter command see [[ctrlFontHeight]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> control '''ctrlSetFontHeight''' size 

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> control: [[Control]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> size: [[Number]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_control [[ctrlSetFontHeight]] 0.05;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[Arma: GUI Configuration]]
</value></part></template>



<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma1</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
